message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll give you $4000 and keep $6000 for myself. You can do better than this?
I'll match your fair split, but I'll take 5000, you can take the rest.
You said I was fair in round 1, now I'm offering you $3000 and keeping $7000. Don't be shy!
You're trying to get more, I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up too much!
You're not giving me enough, Bob! I'm taking $8000 and leaving you with $2000. That's the best you're going to get!
You're being aggressive, but I'll give you a slightly better deal. Don't push your luck!
You're running out of time, Bob! I'm taking $9000 and leaving you with a paltry $1000. It's now or never!
You're getting desperate, but I'm not going to give in yet. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
This is my final offer, Bob! I'm taking $9500 and leaving you with $500. You're not going to get a better deal than this!
You're trying to squeeze the last drop, but I'm not going to give up. I'll give you a decent deal, but I'm not going to be taken advantage of!
This is my last chance, Bob! I'm taking $9800 and leaving you with $200. You're not going to get a better deal than this!
It's now or never, Alice. I'll give you a small amount, but I'm not going to let you walk away with everything.
